fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Howl to the Moon (1-shot): Your presence will be revealed to the town, but all Investigative abilities will fail tonight. This may only be used on Full Moon nights.
-Mauling: Deal a Basic Attack to your target. **Locked**: If it is a Full Moon night, the attack becomes a Powerful Rampage attack.
-Solar Eclipse (**Locked**, 1-shot): During the next day, no player may be lynched/voted. If the town was already unable to lynch/vote for some reason, you will instead disable the Day Chat- players will only be able to communicate via whisper.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Mauled by Lupup**
-**Locked**: You have Basic Defense during Full Moons
-**Unlock Condition**: After the first Full Moon, Unlock.
